speakers.name: Arghya Kamal Guha
speakers.title: Management Consultant | AI & Automation Strategist | LinkedIn Market Insider Certified
speakers.bio: Arghya Kamal Guha is a management consultant at Protiviti Global Consulting, where he specializes in driving digital transformation through AI, automation, and ERP modernization. With a dual academic foundation in Computer Science Engineering (B.Tech) and Business Administration (MBA), Arghya bridges the gap between technical depth and strategic insight. He is LinkedIn Market Insider certified and passionate about creative problem-solving, enterprise automation, and future-forward tech ecosystems.
speakers.talkTitle: AI Implementation in ERP Solutions and MarComm
speakers.talkDescription: A session exploring how AI and automation are transforming ERP modernization and marketing tech workflows, with practical strategies for driving digital transformation in large enterprises.
pastEvents: TechFront AI and Blockchain at R&I PARK
speakers.testimonial: Bridging strategy with technology, Arghya inspires teams to reimagine business possibilities through AI-driven transformation.

speakers.name: Mukul Goyal
speakers.title: Tech Entrepreneur | AI & Blockchain Strategist | Founder – DIMRAJ
speakers.bio: Mukul Goyal is a tech entrepreneur and the founder of DIMRAJ, working at the intersection of AI, blockchain, and software innovation. With a diverse background in software engineering, ML, and digital ecosystems, he actively contributes to developer communities and mentors young innovators. Passionate about India's tech sovereignty, Mukul focuses on building future-ready platforms that blend decentralization and intelligence.
speakers.talkTitle: Blockchain Beyond Crypto: The Real-World Impact of Decentralized Technologies
speakers.alternateTalkTitle: AI x Blockchain: Converging Paths of the Future
speakers.talkDescription: An exploration of how decentralized technologies are revolutionizing industries beyond cryptocurrency, and how AI and blockchain together are shaping the next wave of digital transformation.
pastEvents: TechFront AI and Blockchain at R&I PARK
speakers.testimonial: Mukul empowers India's tech community through open innovation and the fusion of intelligence with decentralization.

speakers.name: Aashi Gupta
speakers.title: Senior AI Engineer
speakers.bio: Aashi Gupta is a Senior AI Engineer at Marsh McLennan with over 5 years of experience in designing and deploying end-to-end AI and NLP solutions. She specializes in building scalable systems using Generative AI, LangChain, LangGraph, and agent-based frameworks. Her work includes enterprise-grade projects like ticket auto-routing, KB article recommendation, and text-to-SQL systems integrated with feedback loops and MLOps dashboards.
degrees: MS in Data Science, Liverpool John Moores University
speakers.talkTitle: Responsible Generative AI in the Enterprise: From Design to Real-World Impact
speakers.talkDescription: Explore the architecture, deployment, and governance of scalable GenAI and NLP systems for enterprise use cases—covering text-to-SQL, recommendations, MLOps dashboards, and feedback-driven improvement.
pastEvents: TechFront AI and Blockchain at R&I PARK
speakers.testimonial: Aashi is recognized for her innovation and passion for building explainable, high-impact AI.

speakers.name: Arun Kumar Yadav
speakers.title: Chief Blockchain Officer
speakers.company: MaalChain (Tijarah Holding Pvt Ltd - Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia)
speakers.bio:
Arun Kumar Yadav is a seasoned blockchain expert with over six years of hands-on experience in building decentralized systems, smart contracts, and blockchain infrastructure. As the CBO & Blockchain Architect at MaalChain, he has led the design and deployment of scalable Layer‑1 protocols, DeFi integrations, and secure network solutions. His deep expertise spans multiple blockchain domains—from protocol development to enterprise-grade infrastructure.

Arun is passionate about expanding blockchain adoption beyond the crypto-finance niche. He actively advocates for real-world implementations that benefit non-technical users, such as governmental applications, identity systems, and supply-chain traceability. His work emphasizes combining blockchain with emerging technologies like AI to create transparent, trustless systems that serve underserved communities.

A frequent speaker at industry and academic events, including TAR UMT, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, Arun is committed to mentoring the next generation of developers. He encourages builders to abstract complexity, prioritize user-centric design, and explore blockchain projects that impact everyday lives.
speakers.talkTitle: Beyond coins - Unlocking blockchain for next billion users
speakers.talkDescription: Discover how blockchain is moving beyond cryptocurrencies to power real-world solutions for identity, supply chain, and government, unlocking transparent, user-centric applications for the next billion users.
speakers.category: blockchain, web3, smart contracts, DeFi, Layer-1, enterprise
speakers.testimonial: Arun brings a unique blend of technical depth and vision for practical, real-world blockchain impact.
